tachyon.client

Class ClientContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.client.ClientContext

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class ClientContext
extends Object
    A shared context in each client JVM. It provides common functionality such as the Tachyon configuration and master address.

    • Method Summary
